overview: A guy comes back to a small city, where he meets his old friends. They have a good time together. In the end of the day, they get into a car with a stranger, whose motives are unknown. Such a spontaneous action turns out to be a chance to become closer to each other and find yourself.

production_companies.name: Kyiv National I. K. Karpenko-Karyi Theatre, Cinema and Television University

title: Aftertaste
